___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.title: Has additional properties

___traits_trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
___traits_trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

___traits_trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
___traits_trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

___traits_trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
___traits_trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

___traits_trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
___traits_trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

description: This represents a reference to external content that should be partially denormalized. Unlike a regular reference, it is used in a promotional context only and will never include the content_elements or related_content of the object being denormalized.

id.description: The id of the ANS document to denormalize.

referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

type.description: The type of the ANS document to denormalize.

title: Representation of a normalized element, intended to only partially denormalize.
